::DrillBit/KitKat2::

"Give us, or help us make a vacine," said KitKat2.

"Yes, I believe one of your friends has released the virus. We need to
stop it," stated DrillBit.

DrillBit lowered his weapon and walked towards Foxfingers, in a peaceful
manner.

"Then The Pack and your group can handle this diplomaticly. Not with
hostages and chemical weapons."
